mapper.update: update pq_class_show set agency_id = #{agencyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, grade_id = #{gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, agency_id, grade_id, class_id, user_id, title, content, state, created_time, updated_time from pq_class_show where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
